title: Topic 003 Question 024
body: You have a Microsoft Teams Phone deployment.
You are deploying Direct Routing by using a certified Session Border Controller (SBC). The FQDN of the SBC is sbc1.contoso.com. You are signaling port 5067.
You cannot place calls and receive an error message in the Microsoft Teams admin center as shown in the following exhibit.
What is a possible cause of the issue?
options: The Forward P-Asserted Identify (PAI) header is disabled.
Licenses are not assigned to the contoso.com domain.
The Baltimore root certificate is missing on the SBC.
The failover timer is set to 0 seconds.
